Content: Why does always crash whenever i tried to open it. Please do something about it.. Because i needed this application as a reference for my project.. Thank you..
Great app. Airnow.gov was crashing and this app stayed current. Clean design
Good app but the widget keeps crashing on my android
Great app but does crash occasionally

Frequently crashed during load the slow responsive air earth which I'd rather show a 2D earth for faster display. Lack of notification. Wish to show AQHI value in widget optionally. Wish to add widgets for more than one place. A week history data are expected additionally. Air figures displayed on map are very slowly, and those figures are frequently hidden away so inconveniently. Finally uninstalled.
The widget doesn't show current conditions unless I go into the app and manually refresh it. Crashes often.
Useful to have when it works. Crashed a few times on my pixel. Why is the by hour chart so messed up?
I have downloaded twice and the app refuses to open, but instead crashes.
Freezes phone when attempting to add new location
Seems to do what it is designed to do with no bugs or crashing.
Fantastic app. Never crashes. Very useful for Kuwait.
Crashed on opening on the first few attempts. Eventually opened but unable to see any data even after db update. Useless.
Crash after first fresh install. HTC 10 @ Nougat

Crashing, suspicious updater included
App have an ability to download additional packages (updates). Installation has been prevented because I have disabled unknown installation sources in my phone. Apart from that, app is crashing, and my "nearest station" status is blank, showing nothing - disabled stations should be filtered and next nearest one should be offered.
Freeze my old phone. Will reinstall on my device since it is very usefull im my city.
application is not supporting 4 x 2 widget in my Note 8 The widget crashes every time
Crashes everytime I click on world map
